review: Was super excited to give Chromecast a try after my vizio google tv pretty much died, and it's ok... One thing all these devices are missing, one of the few things google tv got right is a freaking hdmi out AND an in. Who wants to change inputs? Or better yet try explaining how to do it 500 times to an elderly family member, or better yet any non slightly tech savy family member. After playing long videos on it (hour +) it kinda freezes up and you have to disconnect app from it and reconnect it to get it going again, kinda annoying. Also had it loose connectivity once to my wifi and pwr cycle did not resolve, had to wipe it and set it back up like new.
author: necrackolytez

review: I tried to setup the device by connecting it to my TV. The device had problems finding my network. After a couple of tries, it found it and started to update. The update stayed at 20% for about 10 minutes before I gave up. I read online that it sometimes has problems with a wall mounted TV. I used the HDMI extender, which didn't help. I finally plugged it into one of my receiver HDMI ports. I finally got it to see my network and setup. I was able to see my web browser on the TV. I then tried to stream YouTube from my phone. I am now listening to audio and the only thing on the screen is "Retreiving Data."After over an hour of trying to get this to work, I think I need to give up and return it.

review: I paid a friend with cable the HBO subscription fee so he could add HBO to his account, now I can use that account on HBO Go and use the Chromecast for silky smooth HD playback.  Have not noticed any choppiness so far, very easy to install and use, great tool for cord cutters.

review: Bought this on a whim when it first came out. It hooks up really easily and works well as long as you're using the Chromecast app specifically. Casting web pages is just ok and if you're trying to cast videos from other sites it's just not there yet. That said, it's cheap for what it is and it's a lot of fun for music videos and watching youtube with people over.
